## TmsWorkflow type

Represents a workflow defined on the translation management system.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TmsWorkflow = {
    Id?: string;
    Title?: string;
    Steps?: Array<TmsWorkflowStep>;
};
```

**References:** [TmsWorkflowStep](./open-api-client.tmsworkflowstep.md)
